title: Operation
description: An operation activates a situation and resolves all recipies until completion..

name.title: Name
name.description: The human friendly name to display.  If none is specified, the name is auto generated from the file and line number.

situation.title: Situation
situation.description: The ID of the situation to orchestrate.

startingRecipe.title: Starting Recipe
startingRecipe.description: The recipe solution to start off this orchestration.

ongoingRecipes.title: Ongoing Recipes
ongoingRecipes.description: A map of recipe IDs to their solutions for handling ongoing recipies the situation may encounter.
